title.rendered: Intellectsoft To Showcase Its Expertise at High-Profile Blockchain Conference in Cleveland

content.rendered:
Palo Alto, CA — November 27, 2018 – Intellectsoft today announced participation of the Company’s Chief Executive Officer, Michael Minkevich, at Blockland Cleveland. This inaugural Blockland Solutions Conference hosts numerous leaders from developer and business communities, as well as government, including keynotes by CEOs of AT&T, Oracle, co-founder of Ethereum, and many others.  

Blockland is a community-wide movement to establish a blockchain ecosystem in Cleveland, Ohio, and put this Midwest region at the helm of blockchain thought leadership. It aims to educate and promote real-life application and the significance of this breakthrough technology in business, government, and day-to-day community environment. Blockland Solutions Conference brings together early adopters, technological experts, developers, and entrepreneurs to deliver a multifaceted educational experiences through a series of keynotes, roundtables, panels, and ongoing networking.

Michael Minkevich, who has over 15 years of running global IT services operations focusing on complex application development supported by a multitude of digital technologies, will participate in the “Benefits of IoT and Blockchain for the Supply Chain” panel. The discussion will focus around a number of disruptive real-life use cases and prototypes related to Supply Chain within leading companies across all industries. The panel will take place on Tuesday, December 4, from 4:30 to 5:15 PM.  Michael will be joined by Senthil Virthachalam from IBM; Kris Kersey, Director, PwC Advisory Services; and Manoj K. Malhotra, Dean at Weatherhead School of Management at Case Western Reserve University. The panel will be moderated by Brian Ray, Professor of Law at Cleveland State University.

 

About the Conference

Blockland Solutions Conference will take place on 1-4 December in Huntington Convention Center of Cleveland, OH. The event’s speaker list includes Nick Szabo, one of the founders of blockchain technology; Mark Hurd, CEO at Oracle Corporation; co-founder of Ethereum and founder ConsenSys Joseph Lubin; top executives from IBM; and leading experts from Google, AT&T, Deloitte, and other companies from across industries.  Please refer to the complete agenda for more details.

excerpt.rendered: Intellectsoft goes to a major blockchain conference in US.
